infos.value: Are you all right!? Hold firm!
F-forgive...me, my lord.
This wound is deep... No ordinary swordsman wielded the blade that cut this.
It couldn't be...
It...was...Mura...ga, my lord. He's...here!
Lord Mont... Take this soldier and leave, now.
You're telling me to retreat?
Muraga is no ordinary foe.
But I have you, Lilyth!
I am but one person, victory is far from certain.
Do you find me of no use to you at all?
I am afraid so, my lord. Apologies, of course.
Muraga is bloodying his blade to take back Mach√©rie.
That's why I can give him no quarter!
I've told you already, Lord Mont! This fight will cost you your life!
The Leonis line shall live on, even should we fall afoul of gods to defend it.
King Oelde's words...
I'll defeat him. So just...lend me your strength!
Is that...an order?
And if it was...?
Then I would obey...gladly.
After all, I swore to be Lord Mont's blade till I draw my last breath.
